I've worked with RZA on music for many years, but this time he asked me to be in his Hulu show as an… | 27 comments on LinkedIn
data.text:
Sonic Lens Agency has been recognized as one of the Top Sonic Branding Services Provider by Manage Marketing. Sonic Lens Agency leads the charge in the sonic branding revolution, seamlessly weaving music, strategy and creativity to redefine the field. It stands apart from traditional competitors by prioritizing a meticulous approach that unifies strategy and creative execution. “Sonic Lens champions synchronized branding, total collaboration between visual and sonic teams, resulting in more cohesive and impactful branding solutions,” says Marco Vitali, managing partner. The article will also be featured in the forthcoming special print edition on Sonic Branding 2024. Read More : https://lnkd.in/grSPkeaz #sonicbranding #creativebriefs #strategiccreativity #creativeexpression

This is DOPE. I love when I see creatives think outside of the box, and the “Dun Dun” sculpture showcased during Law & Order: Special Victims Unit’s 25th Anniversary celebration, is a prime example of that. It demonstrates how brands can leverage their sonic identities in impactful ways. And it’s a striking illustration of how brands can bridge the gap between the auditory and the visual — creating a multifaceted sensory experience that is as unique as it is memorable. Rewind just a bit, in case you missed it… SVU celebrated its 25th anniversary with a pop-up event that featured a Dun Dun statue — converting an auditory brand element into a tangible, physically accessible artifact. Pretty cool idea! This not only underscores the impact of sonic branding — in this instance, showcasing how iconic and core “Dun Dun" is to the show's identity, becoming a universally recognized symbol in our culture — but also showcases an unparalleled level of creativity in the realm of sonic branding. It's a bold move that highlights the potential of sonic elements to transcend their traditional roles, turning them into immersive, interactive experiences that deepen fan engagement and loyalty. Takeaways: - Brands should Invest in sonic branding. Typically under appreciated but our sensory experiences forge deep, lasting connections. - Sonic branding can help define brands and set them apart. - Don’t just settle for a great sonic logo or sonic branding assets. There are unique and impactful ways we can seed these sounds into culture, and use them far beyond their traditional roles!
